metadata.description: Collection of AI agent skills for AWS querying (Athena, CloudWatch), Anki flashcard management, audio conversion, safe terminal command registration, and image generation

plugins.name: analyze-mcp
plugins.description: This plugin contains a skill for introspecting MCP servers and testing MCP tool calls via CLI. Use for discovering tools/resources/prompts an MCP server provides or making test calls to MCP servers.

plugins.name: convert-audio
plugins.description: This plugin contains a skill for converting audio files between formats using ffmpeg (MP3, WAV, AAC, FLAC, Opus, OGG), adjusting bitrate/quality, changing sample rate/channels, or modifying playback speed.

plugins.name: manage-anki-flashcards
plugins.description: This plugin contains a skill for working with Anki flashcard software through the AnkiConnect API. Use for creating flashcards, managing decks, searching notes/cards, syncing collections, controlling review sessions, or any Anki automation tasks.

plugins.name: query-aws-athena
plugins.description: This plugin contains a skill for working with AWS Athena queries, including executing queries, downloading results, optimizing query performance, monitoring query progress, or structuring complex queries. Use when querying data in Athena, handling large result sets, or generating reports.

plugins.name: query-cloudwatch-logs
plugins.description: This plugin contains a skill for working with AWS CloudWatch Log Insights, including executing queries, downloading results, optimizing query performance, monitoring query progress with real-time updates. Use when analyzing CloudWatch logs, investigating errors or patterns, or generating reports from log data.

plugins.name: register-safe-terminal-commands
plugins.description: This plugin contains a skill for registering or syncing safe terminal commands to Claude Code settings. Use when configuring which bash commands Claude Code can execute without requiring approval, or when registering/updating the safe commands list from the reference file.

plugins.name: podcast-script-generator
plugins.description: This plugin contains a skill for generating AI-powered podcast scripts with natural conversation flow. Use when creating podcast scripts, multi-speaker dialogue, or conversational content for audio production.

plugins.name: generate-image
plugins.description: This plugin contains a skill for generating images using Amazon Nova Canvas on AWS Bedrock. Use when creating images, AI art, text-to-image generation, or visual content.
